A real-time, automated matching platform could save lives by reducing the time it takes for hospitals to find and contact nearby compatible donors. 

By building BloodLink on ServiceNow:

  • Hospitals can find donors in minutes instead of hours.
  • Automatic emails can be sent to available donors instantly.
  • Faster responses help save lives during emergencies.
  • Real-time tracking helps hospitals and blood banks stay coordinated.
  • The system can show how many donations were made and how quickly requests were fulfilled.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: During emergencies, hospitals struggle to find blood donors quickly. Blood banks often don't have rare blood types. Potential donors don't know when they're urgently needed.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

Using ServiceNow’s , we can create:

  1. A simple form for hospitals to submit blood requests (using a ServiceNow catalog item).
  2. A Donor list (ServiceNow table) that stores donor names, contact info, blood type, and availability.
  3. A Flow Designer workflow that: 
  • Starts automatically when a new request is submitted.
  • Finds all donors with the same blood type.
  • Sends them email or mobile notifications asking if they can donate.
  • A Yes/No response button on the notification that updates their status.

      4.A dashboard that shows:

  • Open requests
  • Donors who accepted
  • Time taken to find a match
  • All of this can be built with forms, lists, notifications, and Flow Designer

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Core ServiceNow platform features only :

  • A list of registered donors with contact information.
  • Email configured in ServiceNow.
  • Donors and hospitals must have access to the ServiceNow platform or portal.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Keeping donor information up-to-date (availability, contact).
  • Getting enough donors to register on the platform.
  • Ensuring quick responses to emails.
  • Maintaining data privacy for donor information.
